channel.title: Server Error
channel.description: I just came back after like a year and a half and I'm attempting to make a new server and I have a problem. When I open the client it says "Client error, reloading in....". I'm assuming this is because the CacheDownloader.java has an invalid link in it but if I recall correctly I remember that you have to upload the cache to a website where it will download instantly. So if this is how I fix the client error, does anyone know a website that I can upload my Cache to?

item.title: Server Error
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

You didn’t zip it right or the cachedownloader.java is bad

Read full topic

item.title: Server Error

item.description:
@Vexillum wrote:

I just tried dropbox and I still get the “Error Downloading Cache… Retrying in 5”. Anyone know how I can fix this?

Read full topic

item.description:
@Vexillum wrote:

I just came back after like a year and a half and I’m attempting to make a new server and I have a problem. When I open the client it says “Client error, reloading in…”. I’m assuming this is because the CacheDownloader.java has an invalid link in it but if I recall correctly I remember that you have to upload the cache to a website where it will download instantly. So if this is how I fix the client error, does anyone know a website that I can upload my Cache to?
